response.answer_text: There are two songs with different lyrics for “How do I live” so not sure which one you may be asking about. LeAnn Rimes does one version. In my opinion, she is more of a “cross-over” performer, meaning her song could be played on more than one platform; for instance, her song may receive air time on a pop music station as well as a country/western station. The other version of “How do I live” was done by Trisha Yearwood. Her song, more than likely would be played on a country/western station. Both songs are equally good, and while I primarily listen to more pop music, I do like some country/western songs as well. That being said I
Its written underneath. Its Marina and the Diamonds. I don't know which song it is though.
